content: Hey, I'm looking for some advice on how to display my vintage collectibles. I just organized my collection and I'm thinking of rearranging my display case. Do you have any tips on how to create a visually appealing display for my Star Wars action figures and comic books? By the way, I recently picked up a sweet vintage Beatles lunchbox from the 70s for $5 at a garage sale, and I'm planning to display it in my music room.
